title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Nov 11 2021
itunes:title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Nov 11 2021
description:
A Veteran's Day thank you to all who've served - and more fallout from the Rittenhouse trial. BLM leader threatens riots and bloodshed in NYC if new mayor Eric Adams gets tough on crime. Biden claims his infrastructure bill will prevent inflation surge as prices soar. Huh? Army Sergeant Rick Yarosh, a veteran and Tunnel to Towers smart home recipient, talks about the day that changed his life and the meaning of hope and home.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
